name: Minions
synopsis: Minions Stuart, Kevin and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a super-villain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

name: Wonder Woman
synopsis: An Amazon princess comes to the world of Man to become the greatest of the female superheroes.

name: Beauty and the Beast
cast: Ulysses Werner:Goldie Gaines:Tracey Tyler:Kimberley Nolan:Deshawn Stephenson:Clement Gill
synopsis: A live-action adaptation of Disney's version of the classic 'Beauty and the Beast' tale of a cursed prince and a beautiful young woman who helps him break the spell.

name: Baby Driver
cast: Dina Bennett:Clarice Santos:Carmela Ho:Trudy Wu:Weston Sanchez:Victoria Arias
synopsis: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

name: Big Hero 6
synopsis: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.
